title: Archie Celebrates Diwali
description: It's Diwali! Archie's favorite holiday. But what if her school friends don't enjoy it as much as she does?Archana loves her family's annual Diwali (deh-vah-lee) party. When a thunderstorm drenches the outside decorations and knocks out the power, Archie wonders if everything will be ruined. How can there be a festival of lights without any electricity?
author: Mitali Banerjee Ruths
